articles.description: Twitter user Andrew 'SpaceDrakeCF' Dice uncovered that Blizzard's mobile dungeon crawler might actually cost you over $500,000
articles.content: Diablo Immortal may be a solid mobile version of Blizzards hack-and-slash dungeon crawler, but its no secret the game has been mired in controversy due to its egregious microtransactions. It was prev… [+3914 chars]
